  • exportAsTemplate

exportAsTemplate

Export existing service instances as a reusable template. Creates a new user template from running services.

exportAsTemplate(
  input: ExportAsTemplateInput!
): ServiceTemplate!

Arguments

exportAsTemplate.inputExportAsTemplateInput! non-null input

Type

ServiceTemplate object

Service template

Previous
exportAlertRuleTemplate
Next
exportRouterConfig

  • Type
